attributes.action: Ban Ticketmaster from reselling gig tickets at massively inflated prices.
attributes.additional_details: please sign this petition so we can raise this scam in parliament.
attributes.background: For years Ticketmaster have ripped off music fans by telling everyone that tickets have sold out for tours after only a few mins, but in reality they hold back tickets and sell them on there sister sites for massively inflated prices. It's time to stand up to Ticketmaster and stop this scam.
